resources.string: Consume all Messages and Quit Looper
On pressing OK, a message of what value \'1\' will be enqueued and it will then be handled by the HandlerCallback handleMessage(). Watch the logs.

On pressing OK, a message with what value of \'2\' will be enqueued, it will then be attempted by the callback handleMessage but it will not be processed. The message will be passed on to Handler.handleMessage() for further processing. Watch the logs.
